Another newbie question...

Among the Heritrix modules, I have found extractors which extract links
from web resources, but I have not seem any "converter" that would
replace these links by local links so that the archives can be served to
web browsers.

I guess that Heritrix users use other tools to do so, but isn't it a
problem?

The processing to perform this conversion is very similar to the
extraction (basically it seems to me that the same regular expressions
have to be use in replace rather than search mode) and it seems
dangerous to me to use different tools which algorithms won't always be
in sync.

Thanks for your answers!

Eric
